title: sans
content:
could anyone help me with this one...  
its on the right on the tip of my tongue i know it but i just cant remember it..  
thx in advance.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [350header.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090819081418/http:/typophile.com/files/350header.jpg) | 41.08 KB |
author: red67

comments.content:
It looks like Futura with modified ’a’, ’n’, ’g’, and ’e’.

- Lex

thanks lex,  
its not a modded futura, it’s a regular face.  
i’ve used this face before in the past but just cant remember the name.

Try Capone Light by Dan X Solo, Dover Publications.

[http://books.google.com/books?id=d9ZlKRr37GUC&pg=PA21&lpg=PA21&dq=Capone...](http://web.archive.org/web/20090819081418/http:/books.google.com/books?id=d9ZlKRr37GUC&pg=PA21&lpg=PA21&dq=Capone+Light+by+Dan+X+Solo,+Dover+Publications&source=bl&ots=gCd4e4YBND&sig=mzl55aQnZTItkIRn-VNRWmbsod4&hl=en&ei=S1-LSoimJZaQmAftqqm0DQ&sa=X&oi=book_result&ct=result&resnum=1#v=onepage&q=&f=false "http://books.google.com/books?id=d9ZlKRr37GUC&pg=PA21&lpg=PA21&dq=Capone+Light+by+Dan+X+Solo,+Dover+Publications&source=bl&ots=gCd4e4YBND&sig=mzl55aQnZTItkIRn-VNRWmbsod4&hl=en&ei=S1-LSoimJZaQmAftqqm0DQ&sa=X&oi=book\_result&ct=result&resnum=1#v=onepage&q=&f=false")
